text: Well I don't remember when I told you that I am making YT videos :slightly_smiling_face::laughing: I'm not, and if I would, it would never be about sport, it would probably be something about vocal help or entartaining videos for fun rather than basketball. Anyways, I just found the apprienceship for me which is about the sales and marketing and its like best thing that could happen to me at this point if not the fakt that they need someone for this year and right now I've got school so its impossible for me to do both and also Its Level 3 and I need higher than that to get the Degree afterwards.
